settings.title: Harness the Power of Nature’s Ultimate Multivitamin

settings.content:
HARNESS THE POWER  OF NATURE’S ULTIMATE  MULTIVITAMIN

Beef organs are nutrient-dense and provide a wide array of essential vitamins and minerals. Our Beef Organs supplement is packed with vital nutrients and peptides to support your overall healthy, vitality and energy.

settings.text: 100% Hormone, Antibiotic, Pesticide, and GMO Free

settings.organ_info_desc: Liver is incredibly rich in vitamins, minerals, peptides and enzymes to support immune, reproductive, digestive, musculoskeletal, and nervous health.
Heart is one of the best sources of CoQ10, a powerful antioxidant for exercise performance and promoting insulin sensitivity. It’s also rich in Taurine and L-carnitine.
Pancreas contains enzymes such as amylase, lipase, and trypsin, as well as B5, B12, and selenium to support digestion and the gut microbiome.
Spleen has high levels of heme iron, the most bioavailable form of iron, to support the nervous system and immune health. It is also rich in niacin and selenium.

settings.content:
UNLOCK THE POWER OF ORGANS

Beef organs are the most nutrient-dense and bioavailable foods on the planet. By incorporating these potent sources of essential nutrients into your diet, you can finally address lingering nutrient inadequacies and deficiencies, paving the way for a remarkable transformation in how you feel and function.

settings.review:
Life changing...

“I have been taking the beef organs for about a year now. I started to notice changes after about 3 weeks of taking them. Energy went up big time and has stayed up, my gut health has improved, I am more mentally clear, I have less pain, increased stamina and overall better health all around. I ditched all my other synthetic vitamins. I am a costumer for life!”
settings.name: Maria

settings.review:
Beef Organs for the win...

“I have been taking Beef Organs for the past year and I am more than happy. For years I was taking handfuls of vitamins and always felt fatigued and frustrated. These are the perfect multivitamin and they help with everything from my energy to my digestion. I always feel off when I don't take them so I know they are working!”
settings.name: Emma

settings.review:
Good stuff...

“I have noticed a difference in how I feel overall. More energy, strength and endurance during workouts. I stopped taking multivitamin since I started with Heart & Soil products...  these are working well for me in workouts and daily life.  I will continue to order.”

settings.review:
This farmer loves Heart & Soil...

“I love H&S Beef Organs. I'm a farmer who raises beef cattle but don't like the taste of organ meat, but know how good they are for you. So I love getting them through your supplements with great quality. My wife has even started taking them. Thanks Y'all!”
settings.name: Jeffrey

settings.info:
Daily Routine Made Easy

 Our freeze-drying process preserves key nutrients in a taste-free capsule that’s easy for anyone to take. Because it’s simply real food, it can be taken with or without a meal.

Heart & Soil Standard 

Rigorous third-party testing, optimized for athletes (Informed Sport Certified), no junk or fillers, sourced from regenerative farms, and free from pesticides, GMO and antibiotics.

A Powerhouse of Nutrition

 Critical nutrients, peptides, and growth factors in one powerful supplement. Improve your overall health, vitality, mood, exercise performance, and energy.

For Anyone Seeking Radical Health 

Optimized for athletes (IS Certified and tested) but accessible to anyone and everyone seeking radical health and vitality.

settings.section_heading:
6 CAPSULES A DAY.  
REAL FOOD. REAL RESULTS.
